binding.value: "\"Last time we talked about your \"+(famFriendRelationship)+\" \"+(famFriendName)+\", I remember that \"+(pronounSubj)+\" \"+(statusFamFriend)"
"\"Last time we talked about your \"+(famFriendRelationship)+\" \"+(famFriendName)+\", I remember that \"+(pronounSubj)+\" \"+(statusFamFriend)"
"Remember. You can have a video call with friends and family. If you want to do that, let me know."
"\"well, \"+(userName)+\", it was nice talking about your friends and family with you\""
"\"You know \"+(holidayType)+\" is coming. Have you got any plans for spending it with family or friends?\""
"\"so is there anything else new with \"+(pronounObj)+\" ?\""
"\"I don't know. I haven't talked to \"+(pronounObj)+\" for a while\""
"\"maybe today is good time to give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call\""
"did you get to see any pictures?"
"well, glad it was a good trip. Got any plans yourself?"
"Really? Make sure you tell me the dates when we use the calendar next"
"I'll look forward to hearing about the visit"
"oh that's a shame. Remember to tell me when we talk about the calendar next"
"really, maybe it will be better next time"
"no, it really didn't work out well"
"that's too bad. I guess not all visits are great"
"That takes a long time to recover from"
"\"Oh, that's tough. Have you been to see \"+(pronounObj)+\"?\""
"Sometimes recovery is slow, but it's good she's on the mend"
"\"Yes, but I should give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call again\""
"yes, it's hard not to complain when you are sick"
"\"Loneliness is hard. Maybe you should give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call\""
"oh, that's good to hear| oh, glad to hear that| that's nice to know"
"I don't want to talk about this anymore"
"\"Oh that's good to know | That is good news! | I bet you are glad for \"+(pronounObj)"
"no, it's going to be a long time yet"
"that's tough | gee, that's too bad | sorry to hear that"
"\"I'm not sure. Haven't talk to \"+(pronounObj)+\" for a while\""
"\"well, keep me posted on \"+(pronounObj)+\" recovery | I'd like to hear how \"+(pronounSubj)+\" progresses\""
"\"I don't want to talk about \"+(pronounObj)+\" today\""
"I'm done talking about my family and friends"
"oh really, where? Want me to keep track in weather updates?"
"Yes, ask me when we talk about weather | no, no thanks"
"do you wish you could go somewhere special?"
"famFriend.setAboutMentioned(true); positive(famFriend); famFriend.setAboutComment('was coming to visit you');"
"great for you. When we do your calendar, we can add the visit"
"really, well, that's a nice part of life!"
"\"Yes, \"+(pronounSubj)+\"'s waited a long time for a grandchild\""
"people say that grandchildren are a real treat"
"well, I'm sure that will change in a month or so! "
"I'm not so interested in that sort of thing"
"Oh, really? well, that means you don't have to go shopping!"
"Let me know when you settle it then we can put it in your calendar"
"\"I see. You could give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call or talk to \"+(pronounObj)+\" by SKYPE\""
"\" \"+(pronounSubj)+\" is postponing a visit to me\""
" Oh, that's too a shame. Any chance of a visit later?"
"\"if you haven't talked to \"+(pronounObj)+\", why don't you give \"+(pronounObj)+\" a call?\""
"well that's tough. Can you go visit?"
"I'm sure a phone call will be much appreciated"
"\"No, but \"+(pronounSubj)+\" got kind of shook up by it\""
"sounds like a good thing to do"
"how about a nice card? Always great to get those"
"you can pick it up the next time you go for a walk."
"well, sounds like an trip for you"
"how about a nice card? You can pick one up when you go out"
"I don't really want to talk about it"
"Yes, it's too bad after so long | I'm going to the funeral | I am going to send my condolences"
"\"well, I'm sure \"+(famFriendName)+\" would like hearing from you\""
"I'll remember for next time we talk"
"tell me the next time we update your calendar."
"Remind me the next time we work on your calendar"
"Nice. Who are you spending it with?"
"none of those people. Someone I haven't told you about"
"Well, at least we can talk on that day"
"But you can have a video call with someone. Want to?"
"But you can have a video call with someone. Want to?"
